body: i'm thankful to have escaped from a crowded restaurant full of noise into a quiet empty street at magic hour and am thankful, in that cloud of relief, to have turned and started walking back to the hotel and to have seen one of my best friends a block ahead of me, having done the same thing a minute earlier. i'm thankful to have sped up and caught her so we could walk home together.
